page.description: If enabled, allows you to control whether or not the user can tab out of the container.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Constrain tab key]* property can be enabled to prevent the user from tabbing out of a contained by setting the property to "Yes" or "Javascript":

item.name: No
item.description: The default value. User can tab out of the container.

item.name: Yes
item.description: User cannot use the tab or shift+tab keys to tab out of the controls in the container.

item.name: Javascript
item.description: A JavaScript function is called to determine whether or not the user can tab out of the control. See [Constrain javascript function] for more information.

page.tip: Using this feature you can constrain controls in a Panel Card by wrapping all of the controls in a container.
